text:
When trying to view the live agent output of an in progress task in build, I get this error on the server:

[0] [WS] Client subscribed to agent output for task opensprint.dev-dlp
[0] [Error] Cannot read properties of undefined (reading 'lastIndexOf') TypeError: Cannot read properties of undefined (reading 'lastIndexOf')
[0]     at TaskService.extractEpicId (/Users/todd/My Drive/Code/opensprint.dev/packages/backend/src/services/task.service.ts:102:24)
[0]     at TaskService.beadsIssueToTask (/Users/todd/My Drive/Code/opensprint.dev/packages/backend/src/services/task.service.ts:57:25)
[0]     at TaskService.getTask (/Users/todd/My Drive/Code/opensprint.dev/packages/backend/src/services/task.service.ts:50:17)
[0]     at async <anonymous> (/Users/todd/My Drive/Code/opensprint.dev/packages/backend/src/routes/tasks.ts:38:18)
